In the original denoising process (a), high-frequency components gradually diminish while low-frequency components become more prominent as the denoising progresses to late stages. With Omegance, increasingœâùúî\omegaitalic_œâleads to more aggressive removal of the high-frequency components, as shown in (b), and vice versa, as depicted in (c).
